title: The Test of Courage by Christopher Robbins
description:
Michel Thomas survived French concentration and slave labour camps, endured interrogation and torture and after the war became a Nazi-hunter, capturing important war criminals. 

It was through these remarkable and terrifying experiences that Thomas came to develop his revolutionary language learning system - a system that is currently taking the world by storm. This is his remarkable story, told by his friend and biographer Chrsistopher Robbins.

Genre: Non-fiction, Biographies/Memoirs
